bugs.summary: Update dav1d to 0.6.0
Implement setPositionState in Media Session interface
Don't start a stop timer for the media which is being used in PIP mode
Rework cubeb-coreaudio threading model
<script defer> should wait for stylesheet loads.
Latest version of Firefox no longer accepts MacOS text clippings in the google search field. This is a standard part of our work flow.
Restrict strictly enforcing MIME checks for Worker scripts to early beta or earlier
Annotate `Selection::ScrollIntoView` with `MOZ_CAN_RUN_SCRIPT`
Document and simplify some Selection related code
OOP iframe that follows a text input in the tab order steals focus when focusing the text input
Remove content-process use of nsIFocusManager::GetActiveWindow
Crash in [@ mozilla::dom::XULTreeElement::GetTreeBodyFrame]

Perma [tier 2] aarch64 css-ui-invalid/default-style/button.html == css-ui-invalid/default-style/button-ref.html | application crashed [@ mozilla::gfx::AlphaBoxBlur::BoxBlur_NEON(unsigned char*, int, int, int, int, unsigned int*, unsigned int) const]
Perma [tier2] browser/components/tests/browser/browser_webrender_and_fission_notification.js | Did we get the Fission/WebRender warning right? - Got false, expected true
Remove document splitting code
Crash in [@ std::io::stdio::_eprint] during fluent_bundle_add_resource
Implement RegExp s (dotAll) flag
Remove JSErrorReport flags
Remove support for storing GCCellPtrs in the GCThingList
Support more JSOps in WarpBuilder
Remove Optimization tracking documentation
ARM64: Improve negative zero check for LMulI
Perma SM bustage TEST-UNEXPECTED-FAIL | js/src/jit-test/tests/gc/bug1620200.js:8:20 ReferenceError: TypedObject is not defined when Gecko 76 merges to Beta on 2020-04-06
Fix bug in wasm spec-test importer
Create run-time switch for wasm multi-value
Improved web platform tests for CSS grid with repeat(auto)
[socket process] Enable xpcshell tests for socket process
Cookies don't seem to be propagated with laxByDefault
We should support slow read in Http3
Improve Http3 closing

Perma [tier2] browser/base/content/test/webrtc/browser_devices_get_user_media_in_frame.js | Uncaught exception - at chrome://mochitests/content/browser/browser/base/content/test/webrtc/browser_devices_get_user_media_in_frame.js:521 - TypeError: gBrowser
Turn DTLS 1.0 back on to prevent sites breaking during Covid-19 traffic increase
Stop using JSImpl for RTCRtpReceiver
regression: macOS' look up gesture could not work in content process
Force Aqua appearance on via Info.plist key
On older gcc, FallibleTArray<E> cannot be move-constructed from nsTArray<E>
Advance toolkit.shutdown.lateWriteChecksStage pref to 3 on Nightly
Document node not highlighted in inspector from Accessibility tab
server/tests/xpcshell/test_breakpoint-01.js fails to run checks and 02.js should be disable
Better DevTools docs for new contributors
Perma tier2 devtools/shared/resources/tests/browser_target_list_frames.js | retrieved only the top level document - Got 2, expected 1
Move all devtools/shared/fronts files to devtools/client
H3: Cached H3 resources show "HTTP/3.0" instead of "HTTP/3" in webtools Version field
Intermittent devtools/client/netmonitor/src/har/test/browser_net_har_copy_all_as_har.js | There must be some page title -
Copy as cURL should include --globoff
Cannot see raw data of websocket frames
[Intermittent] The onboarding tip is displayed in about:newtab only after clicking in the Address Bar at browser normal restart
Allow the setting (and locking) of the default Autoplay value
Make gKeywordURIFixup a good browser.js citizen

Intermittent Fission browser/base/content/test/fullscreen/browser_fullscreen_window_focus.js | Test timed out - | Found a tab after previous test timed out: http://example.com/browser/browser/base/content/test/fullscreen/open_and_focus_helper.html -
DevTools UI - create collapse toggle for message table JSON
[Protection Report] If user already has mobile product, hide promotion.
Search configuration tests should be able to be run against the server
Built-in search engines shouldn't store full details in the cache
Remove unused Utils.serializeInputStream, Utils.shallowCopy
An increase in the number of tabs not correctly connecting to content processes are being reported for recent Nightlies
[Win7] Close button is not aligned with minimize and maximize in fullscreen mode
String encoding issues in the Lockwise OS authentication dialog on Windows

Intermittent TV browser/components/aboutlogins/tests/browser/browser_loginSortOrderRestored.js | Cleanup function threw an exception - at resource://services-settings/Database.jsm:26 - TypeError: IndexedDB: clear() can't access property "transacti
Run `mach mozregression` with Python 3
Editing some doc pages doesn't re-render
Allow mozlint to run on dot files
ESLint jobs fail early on toolkit/components/pictureinpicture/tests/head.js
[rust] Reformat the tree using rustfmt
Update mozlint so it is able to use configuration files in an alternate path
Set 'ArgumentParser.prog' properly when an external parser is used
App fails to start after opening certain files from content providers
Remove formhelper.mode pref
Assert network is always present in GVE and TestRunnerActivity
GeckoSession.reload(GeckoSession.LOAD_FLAGS_BYPASS_CACHE) fails to bypass cache.
Don't use custom linker on Android 6.0+
consume distribution.ini  from partners instead of defining it in-tree
DATE is misconfigured in flatpaks
ThreadSanitizer: data race [@ QuitProgressUI] vs. [@ ShowProgressUI] in updater
Linking failure in nsEmbedFunctions.o with --disable-crashreporter
Default browser agent not being packaged
Crash in [@ mozilla::ReadEntry]
Re-enable the "Change to existing username, different password" test in browser_doorhanger_form_password_edit.js" test
Cache the last application version from compatibility.ini
content scripts are needlessly compiled on parent process
Move WebExtension Port messaging off MessageChannel
